title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A friend may need to receive some pointed advice from you today. However, you might be reluctant to give any because you dont want to hurt their feelings. Thankfully, you can be kind as well as clear while you try to make a lasting and transformative impression. Usually, molding someone toward your vision of them leads down a road to negative consequences. Instead, support the best possible image they have for themselves by validating their worth. Be a partner, not a parent. Treat others with the same love and respect you wish to receive. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
